metadata.title: CVE-2018-10927 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in RPC request using gfs3_lookup_req in glusterfs server.An authenticated attacker could use this flaw to leak information andexecute remote denial of service by crashing gluster brick process.

criterions.comment: glusterfs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
